fun_fact: Hurple's a long lost Henry the Hoover's cousin with a shade of Hurple (that's Oldcord's blurple!)
Hurple's canonical power is over 9000, he once accidentally suck up three #general channels and a server moderator.
Hurple and Wumpus are long distance friends.
Pong was of the first arcade games ever created.
Sega Saturn's copy protection system took security researchers until 2016 to crack.
Nintendo, despite suing people for creating emulators, actually made emulators themselves, and used unlicensed roms for testing.
